thread.section_title: Le 123 Sebastopol - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Unrivalled customer service
thread.title_full: Unrivalled customer service - Review of Le 123 Sebastopol - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Eleanor29
title: Unrivalled customer service
text: Overnight stay 4th March for a birthday celebration. Staff could not have been more helpful - particularly when we arrived back at 2am - the two night staff on duty could not have been more pleased to see us! Nothing felt like an inconvenience the whole time we were there. Most companies talk about customer service but don't actually deliver it - this hotel is in a class of its own.
